blocks.content:
Cora checked her dress, took a last look at her invitation, sighed, and walked to the right door. The rumor on the street was that the House of Pleasures was a place with strong magic. When Cora touched the knocker, she could tell the rumors were true. She felt a little tingle of energy.

As the door opened and Cora entered the lavish hall, she felt more than a tingle. A warm, sensual feeling lingered in the air. It was very different from mundane things everyone could do, like producing little wisps of light or making sure you couldn’t lose your reading glasses. Cora would never even dream she’d merit an invitation to a place like this.

The doorman took her to a lavishly decorated room where Madame herself welcomed Cora to the House of Pleasures. She was a prestigious woman with witty eyes. Her expression made Cora feel like Madame knew more about her than anyone else.

“I’m glad you decided to be our guest, dear Cora,” Madame said with a warm smile. “We are honored to have you .”

“I’m honored you invited me,” Cora whispered. A servant appeared behind the dark velvet curtains. He or she was such a beautiful creature that Cora gasped.

Micah had long, willowy hair that looked like silk. They served refreshments and smiled at Cora. Cora noticed intricate markings on Micah’s skin. Micah winked at Cora, and the markings did a little dance.

“Thank you, dear Micah,” Madame said and gestured to Cora to help herself to the fruit drinks and delicious treats. Cora chose a drink.

“Micah is a rare creature. I’m so lucky that they serve us,” Madame said and sipped her drink. She eyed Cora for a moment or two. When she spoke, her words were gentle and powerful at the same time. “Now. Please tell me what brings you here.”

Cora hesitated for a moment before she answered. “I’ve lost my pleasure.” She could feel the blush creeping on her cheeks. She drank from her glass and added: “I lost my pleasure a long time ago, and I can’t seem to attract a partner.”

“You’ve attracted us,” Madame said. Her gaze pierced Cora, not hurting, but searching. Suddenly, Cora was relieved she had told the truth.

“Adoration,” Madame finally said.

“I’m sorry?”

“You need adoration. For someone to tell you, and show you how unique you are.” She clapped her hands, and Micah appeared again. Madame told them something in a low voice. She stood up and asked Cora to follow her. They went to a marble hall with many doors.

“I’ll give you two choices today,” Madame said. “They’ll provide different experiences, but your pleasure is always guaranteed.”

She gestured towards the doors. “Behind the green door, you’ll find the twins, Victor and Victoria. They are experts in the use of toys and their quick tongues. I’ll tell you this: The twins do not ask questions. If you enter the green door, you give yourself into their capable hands.”

“Behind the blue door, you’ll find Ores. His body is his tool, and all his attention is yours. He’s excellent at reading what you need, what you crave. Once you’ve chosen, I’ll open the door for you.”

choseOne.text: “I’ll go through the green door, to Victor and Victoria.”

choseTwo.text: “I’ll go through the blue door, to Ores.”

blocks.content:
Madame took a set of keys from her pocket. She knocked on the door and then opened it. Cora saw a spacious room with divans, luscious plants, and light curtains. A man and a woman waited in the room, clad in similar white outfits. They were both silver blonds with long, flowy hair. Victoria sat on the ground with her legs crossed. Victor lounged on a divan.

“Victor and Victoria, this is our dear guest, Cora,” Madame said. Victoria got up and came straight to Cora. Without hesitation, she took Cora’s hand, pulled her close, and kissed her lightly.

“Victor, come and take a look. She’s lovely!” she exclaimed. She glanced at Madame who gave an approving nod.

Victor came to them, bowed to them both, and eyed Cora curiously. “I can’t wait to hear the sounds you make,” he said with a smile.

“I’ll leave Cora to enjoy your company,” Madame said. The twins were already leading Cora to one of the divans. She didn’t manage to say anything, only saw Victor bow to Madame as he closed the door.

“Stand there,” Victoria said, her words not pushy but curious and happy, as they’d received a new playmate. “You are ours now. We’ll take care of you.”

“I want to undress her,” Victor said. Their words were odd to Cora, as if they were talking about her, but not to her. At the same time, all their interest was on her. Victoria stroked her hair, and Victor placed his hands on the hem of her shirt and on her hips.

Victor looked at her with a question in his eyes. Cora just nodded, and he pulled her shirt off.

“So beautiful,” Victoria said. “Victor, stand behind her.” She kissed Cora again, lightly first, then with a demanding tongue. Victor’s hands pulled Cora close to him, and she felt his lips on her neck. Victoria let her hands slide lower on her breasts.

Cora tried to hold her sighs and moans back but very soon realized she didn’t have to. And, finally, she couldn’t. The twins' hands were all over her. Their kisses lit her on fire.

“I want her on the divan, on her back,” Victoria said. Cora could feel her skin burn. She let Victor take her to the divan as Victoria sat on her knees on the end of the furniture. “Here beautiful, on your back.”

Gently, but firmly, she opened Cora’s legs. Her hands traveled up from Cora’s ankles to her thighs. Cora longed for her to take it all the way, to touch her sex, but Victoria just winked at her. “Victor, what would we do with her?”

Victor eyed Cora keenly and then looked at his sister. “You could use your toys. And I would use my tongue.”

Victoria got excited. “Or you, my dear brother, could use your hands, and I could use my tongue.”

Both of their eyes turned to Cora. While they were talking, their hands caressed her skin.

“You decide, Victoria,” Victor said.

choseOne.text: “I’ll use my toys, and you use your tongue.”

choseTwo.text: “I’ll use my tongue, and you use your hands.”
